text: Army of the Damned: Create thirteen 2/2 black zombie creature tokens with defender
Oust: each player chooses a creature they control and puts into the owner's library second from the top and then gains 3 life
Soul Shatter: Each player sacrifices a creature or planewalker with the highest converted mana cost amoung creatures and planeswalkers they control
Dust to Dust: each player removes 2 artifacts they control from the game

Ad Nauseam: Each player reveals the top card of their library and puts that card into their hand. They lose live equal to the converted mana cost. All players may repeat this process any number of times
White Sun Zenith: put {x} 2/2 cat creature tokens onto the battlefield, they have defender
Aether Snap: Remove all counters from all permanents and exile all tokens controlled by players
Karma: Each player takes damage equal to the amount of swamps in play
Atrocious Experiment: Each player mills two cards, draws two cards, and loses 2 life
Humility: All creatures lose all abilities and have a base power and thoughness of 1/1 until next turn
Barter in Blood: Each player sacrifices two creatures
Bargain: All players draw a card, Angel of Death gains {7*p} life
Caustic Rain: Each player exiles a land they control
Swords to Plowshares: each player exiles {x} creature(s) they control and gains life equal to its/their power
Exsanguinate: all players lose {x} life and troll king gains {xp} life
Entreat the Angels: Create {x/2} white Angel creature tokens with flying, they have defender
Dark Deal: Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards minus one
Disenchant: Destroy target artifact or enchantment from each player
Davriel's Shadowfugue: Each player discards two cards and loses 2 life
Sign in Blood: each player draws 2 cards and loses 2 life
